name: monogrammed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of clothes or other possessions) decorated with a monogram (= a symbol formed from the first letters of a person's name): monogrammed envelopes He took out a monogrammed handkerchief and blew his nose. See
monogram
More examplesFewer examplesa pair of powder-blue slippers monogrammed in gold Orders for monogrammed items cannot be canceled or returned.When police went into his flat, they were amazed to find 300 monogrammed shirts.
